name: @suns/react-monorepo-nx

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist; yarn nx reset ; rm -rf apps/frontend/odd/src/lib/lorem_* && rm -rf apps/frontend/even/src/lib/lorem_* && rm -rf shared/src/lib/lorem_*
scripts.jsondir:bundle: yarn node tools/jsondir.mjs dist/apps/frontend/assets shared;yarn node tools/jsondir.mjs dist/apps/frontend/assets odd;yarn node tools/jsondir.mjs dist/apps/frontend/assets even
scripts.jsondir:esm: yarn node tools/jsondir.mjs dist/apps/frontend-esm/assets shared;yarn node tools/jsondir.mjs dist/apps/frontend-esm/assets odd;yarn node tools/jsondir.mjs dist/apps/frontend-esm/assets even
scripts.build: yarn nx affected --target=build && yarn jsondir:bundle #build only changed
scripts.unbundle: yarn nx run frontend:unbundle:development && yarn jsondir:esm
scripts.nx:upgrade: yarn nx migrate latest # same as nx migrate nx@latest
scripts.preview: yarn build && yarn nx preview frontend
scripts.preview:help: echo run release build and start web server
scripts.prod: yarn build && cd dist/apps/frontend && npx http-server -o .
scripts.esm: yarn unbundle && cd dist/apps/frontend-esm && npx http-server -o .
scripts.lorem: yarn clean; yarn lorem:shared && yarn lorem:even && yarn lorem:odd
scripts.lorem:shared: [ -z "$LOREM_DEPTH" ] && export LOREM_DEPTH=4; [ -z "$LOREM_PARAGRAPHS" ] && export LOREM_PARAGRAPHS=10; yarn nx g lorem-generator lorem shared --depth=$LOREM_DEPTH --paragraphs=$LOREM_PARAGRAPHS --text=""; yarn node tools/jsondir.mjs shared/src/lib shared
scripts.lorem:even: [ -z "$LOREM_DEPTH" ] && export LOREM_DEPTH=4; [ -z "$LOREM_PARAGRAPHS" ] && export LOREM_PARAGRAPHS=20; yarn nx g lorem-generator lorem frontend-even  --depth=$LOREM_DEPTH --paragraphs=$LOREM_PARAGRAPHS   --text=""; yarn node tools/jsondir.mjs apps/frontend/even/src/lib even
scripts.lorem:odd: [ -z "$LOREM_DEPTH" ] && export LOREM_DEPTH=4; [ -z "$LOREM_PARAGRAPHS" ] && export LOREM_PARAGRAPHS=40; yarn nx g lorem-generator lorem frontend-odd  --depth=$LOREM_DEPTH --paragraphs=$LOREM_PARAGRAPHS   --text=""; yarn node tools/jsondir.mjs apps/frontend/odd/src/lib odd

description: To evaluate and compare the bundled and unbundled builds on large codebase.
author: Sasha Firsov
